anathema: Create arts or crafts, serve a mortal, assist in mortal aims except to subvert and corrupt them
edict: Foil rulers, the proud, and the powerful; ruin anything created by mortals
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Ahriman (Lord of the Divs)](/Deities.aspx?ID=563)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 318

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Foil rulers, the proud, and the powerful; ruin anything created by mortals

**Anathema** Create arts or crafts, serve a mortal, assist in mortal aims except to subvert and corrupt them

**Area of Concern**
Destruction, divs, nihilism

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38)

**Favored Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=404)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=69), [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Nothingness](/Domains.aspx?ID=114)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Ill Omen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1566)

- **2nd**
[Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=1670)

- **5th**
[Wave of Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=1757)

</column>
name: Ahriman (Lord of the Divs)
